p: The Cu-Nsp with 2-pyrimidinamine derivatives was performed by hydrogen donor antioxidants (AOH), steadying and postponing the free radicals of oxidation lipids. In in vitro studies of free radical fabrication, an azo compound was causing free radicals by impulsive thermal decomposition. Alkylperoxy free radicals were produced via the water-soluble AAPH used as a hygienic and governable source thermally. AAPH assay was achieved to enhance the antioxidant activity of Cu-Nsp with 2-pyrimidinamine; the compound 1c and Cu-Nps-Pyr-1c are awarding activities of 75.6 and 91.2%, respectively, at a concentration of 100 μg/mL.
